title: Final Review
description: Warning: Some Scenes May Disturb  Every author knows that paying too much attention to bad reviews will only lead to trouble, and Emma's about to find this out the hard way, thanks to her boyfriend, Wade. After the success and praise received from her first book, the two that followed haven’t done so well, and the less than shining reviews have disheartened Emma to the point where she considers pulling her books and perhaps even giving up writing altogether. Wade will have none of that, however. When Emma tells Wade reviewers are calling her books "unrealistic," Wade sets out to teach Emma how to add realism to her horror stories. Just how “real” things get goes far beyond Emma’s expectations.
author: Dawn Cano
